newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Wednesday closed up 0.09 percent in higher trade, bourse sources said.
The market's 29-share index closed at 612.43 from 611.88 on Tuesday.
Trade volume was 3.1 million dinars against 2.2 million dinars.
Banque du Sud was down 3.01 percent to 29.29 dinars.
BTEI bank down 0.18 percent to 21.86 dinars.
BDET bank was up 1.48 percent to 20.45 dinars, and retal stores Monoprix up 1.07 percent to 47 dinars.
